de.griefed.serverpackcreator

Class ServerPackHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.serverpackcreator.ServerPackHandler

  • @Component
public class ServerPackHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Create a server pack from a modpack by copying all specified or required files from the modpack to the server pack as well as installing the modloader server for the specified modloader, modloader version and Minecraft version. Create a ZIP-archive of the server pack, excluding the Minecraft server JAR, for immediate upload to CurseForge or other platforms.

      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> scanAnnotations(java.io.File[] filesInModsDir)
      Scan the fml-cache-annotation.json-files in mod JAR-files of a given directory for their sideness.
      If clientSideOnly specifies "value": "true", and is not listed as a dependency for another mod, it is added and therefore later on excluded from the server pack.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> scanTomls(java.io.File[] filesInModsDir)
      Scan the mods.toml-files in mod JAR-files of a given directory for their sideness.
      If [[mods]] specifies side=BOTH|SERVER, it is added.
      If [[dependencies.modId]] for Forge|Minecraft specifies side=BOTH|SERVER, it is added.
      Any modId of a dependency specifying side=BOTH|SERVER is added.
      If no sideness can be found for a given mod, it is added to prevent false positives.
      (package private) void zipBuilder(java.lang.String minecraftVersion, boolean includeServerInstallation, java.lang.String destination)
      Creates a ZIP-archive of the server_pack directory excluding the Minecraft server JAR.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerPackHandler

        @Autowired
public ServerPackHandler(LocalizationManager injectedLocalizationManager,
                                    CurseCreateModpack injectedCurseCreateModpack,
                                    AddonsHandler injectedAddonsHandler,
                                    ConfigurationHandler injectedConfigurationHandler,
                                    ApplicationProperties injectedApplicationProperties,
                                    VersionLister injectedVersionLister)
        Constructor

        Used for Dependency Injection.

        Receives an instance of LocalizationManager or creates one if the received one is null. Required for use of localization.

        Parameters:
        injectedLocalizationManager - Instance of LocalizationManager required for localized log messages.
        injectedCurseCreateModpack - Instance of CurseCreateModpack required for creating a modpack from CurseForge.
        injectedAddonsHandler - Instance of AddonsHandler required for accessing installed addons, if any exist.
        injectedConfigurationHandler - Instance of ConfigurationHandler required for accessing checks.
        injectedApplicationProperties - Instance of Properties required for various different things.
        injectedVersionLister - Instance of VersionLister required for everything version related.

        Returns:

      • cleanupEnvironment

        private void cleanupEnvironment(boolean deleteZip,
                                java.lang.String destination)
        Deletes all files, directories and ZIP-archives of previously generated server packs to ensure newly generated server pack is as clean as possible.
        Parameters:
        deleteZip - Boolean. Whether to delete the server pack ZIP-archive.
        destination - String. The destination at which to clean up in.

      • createStartScripts

        void createStartScripts(java.lang.String modLoader,
                        java.lang.String javaArguments,
                        java.lang.String minecraftVersion,
                        java.lang.String modloaderVersion,
                        java.lang.String destination)
        Create start-scripts for the generated server pack.
        Parameters:
        modLoader - String. Whether to copy the Forge or Fabric scripts into the server pack.
        javaArguments - String. Java arguments to write the start-scripts with.
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version the modpack uses.
        modloaderVersion - String. The modloader version the modpack uses.
        destination - String. The destination where the scripts should be created in.

      • copyFiles

        void copyFiles(java.lang.String modpackDir,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> directoriesToCopy,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> clientMods,
               java.lang.String minecraftVersion,
               java.lang.String destination)
        Copies all specified directories and mods, excluding clientside-only mods, from the modpack directory into the server pack directory. If a source/file;destination/file-combination is provided, the specified source-file is copied to the specified destination-file. Calls excludeClientMods(String, List, String) to generate a list of all mods to copy to server pack, excluding clientside-only mods.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. Files and directories are copied into the server_pack directory inside the modpack directory.
        directoriesToCopy - String List. All directories and files therein to copy to the server pack.
        clientMods - String List. List of clientside-only mods to exclude from the server pack.
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version the modpack uses.
        destination - String. The destination where the files should be copied to.

      • excludeClientMods

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> excludeClientMods(java.lang.String modsDir,
                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> userSpecifiedClientMods,
                                                   java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Generates a list of all mods to include in the server pack excluding clientside-only mods. Automatically detects clientside-only mods for Minecraft 1.13+, if the mods mods.toml-file is correctly set up.
        Parameters:
        modsDir - String. The mods-directory of the modpack of which to generate a list of all it's contents.
        userSpecifiedClientMods - List String. A list of all clientside-only mods.
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version the modpack uses. Determines whether mods are scanned for sideness.
        Returns:
        List String. A list of all mods to include in the server pack.

      • excludeFileOrDirectory

        private boolean excludeFileOrDirectory(java.lang.String fileToCheckFor)
        Check whether the given file is present in the list of directories to exclude from the server pack.
        Parameters:
        fileToCheckFor - String. The string to check for.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the file is found in the list of directories to exclude, false if not.

        pathToServerIcon - String. The path to the custom server-icon.

                    java.lang.String pathToServerProperties)
        Copies the server.properties into server_pack.
        Parameters:

        pathToServerProperties - String. The path to the custom server.properties.

      • installServer

        void installServer(java.lang.String modLoader,
                   java.lang.String minecraftVersion,
                   java.lang.String modLoaderVersion,
                   java.lang.String javaPath,
                   java.lang.String destination)
        Installs the modloader server for the specified modloader, modloader version and Minecraft version. Calls

        downloadFabricJar(String) to download the Fabric installer into the server_pack directory.

        downloadForgeJar(String, String, String) to download the Forge installer for the specified Forge version and Minecraft version.

        cleanUpServerPack(File, File, String, String, String, String) to delete no longer needed files generated by the installation process of the modloader server software.

        Parameters:
        modLoader - String. The modloader for which to install the server software. Either Forge or Fabric.
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version for which to install the modloader and Minecraft server.
        modLoaderVersion - String. The modloader version for which to install the modloader and Minecraft server.
        javaPath - String. The path to the Java executable/binary which is needed to execute the Forge/Fabric installers.
        destination - String. The destination where the modloader server should be installed into.

      • zipBuilder

        void zipBuilder(java.lang.String minecraftVersion,
                boolean includeServerInstallation,
                java.lang.String destination)
        Creates a ZIP-archive of the server_pack directory excluding the Minecraft server JAR.

        Parameters:
        minecraftVersion - String. Determines the name of the Minecraft server JAR to exclude from the ZIP-archive if the modloader is Forge.
        includeServerInstallation - Boolean. Determines whether the Minecraft server JAR info should be printed.
        destination - String. The destination where the ZIP-archive should be created in.

      • getMinecraftServerJarUrl

        private java.lang.String getMinecraftServerJarUrl(java.lang.String minecraftVersion)
        Retrieves the URL to the Minecraft server for the specified Minecraft version.
        Parameters:
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version for which to retrieve the URL for the server-jar.
        Returns:
        String. The URL to the server-jar of the specified Minecraft version as a string.

      • downloadFabricJar

        boolean downloadFabricJar(java.lang.String destination)
        Downloads the release Fabric installer into the server pack.

        Parameters:
        destination - String. The destination where the Fabric JAR-file should be downloaded to.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the download was successfull.

      • downloadForgeJar

        boolean downloadForgeJar(java.lang.String minecraftVersion,
                         java.lang.String modLoaderVersion,
                         java.lang.String destination)
        Downloads the modloader server installer for Forge, for the specified modloader version.
        Parameters:
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version for which to download the modloader server installer.
        modLoaderVersion - String. The Forge version for which to download the modloader server installer.
        destination - String. The destination where the Forge-installer should be downloaded to.
        Returns:
        Boolean. Returns true if the download was successful.

      • cleanUpServerPack

        void cleanUpServerPack(java.io.File fabricInstaller,
                       java.io.File forgeInstaller,
                       java.lang.String modLoader,
                       java.lang.String minecraftVersion,
                       java.lang.String modLoaderVersion,
                       java.lang.String destination)
        Cleans up the server_pack directory by deleting left-over files from modloader installations and version checking.
        Parameters:
        fabricInstaller - File. The Fabric installer file which is to be deleted.
        forgeInstaller - File. The Forge installer file which is to be deleted.
        modLoader - String. Whether Forge or Fabric files are to be deleted.
        minecraftVersion - String. Needed for renaming the Forge server JAR to work with launch scripts provided by ServerPackCreator.
        modLoaderVersion - String. Needed for renaming the Forge server JAR to work with launch scripts provided by ServerPackCreator.
        destination - String. The destination where we should clean up in.

      • scanTomls

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> scanTomls(java.io.File[] filesInModsDir)
        Scan the mods.toml-files in mod JAR-files of a given directory for their sideness.
        If [[mods]] specifies side=BOTH|SERVER, it is added.
        If [[dependencies.modId]] for Forge|Minecraft specifies side=BOTH|SERVER, it is added.
        Any modId of a dependency specifying side=BOTH|SERVER is added.
        If no sideness can be found for a given mod, it is added to prevent false positives.
        Parameters:
        filesInModsDir - A list of in which to check the mods.toml-files.
        Returns:
        List String. List of mods not to include in server pack based on mods.toml-configuration.

      • scanAnnotations

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> scanAnnotations(java.io.File[] filesInModsDir)
        Scan the fml-cache-annotation.json-files in mod JAR-files of a given directory for their sideness.
        If clientSideOnly specifies "value": "true", and is not listed as a dependency for another mod, it is added and therefore later on excluded from the server pack.
        Parameters:
        filesInModsDir - A list of in which to check the mods.toml-files.
        Returns:
        List String. List of mods not to include in server pack based on fml-cache-annotation.json-content.
